summary: The document is a dispatch from the Chief of Base, SHAVE, dated 20 June 1962, transmitting photostatic copies of two letters to Lucas Moran, a member of the Movimiento Democrata Cristiano, for duplication by MOLLA-a. It includes specific instructions on handling and distribution, highlighting its sensitive nature. This document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, indicating its historical significance related to the JFK assassination records and Cold War-era activities.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It involves the transmission of letters to Lucas Moran of the Movimiento Democrata Cristiano, suggesting a connection to political movements in Cuba.
The handling of the letters is subject to specific restrictions, indicating their sensitive nature.
The document dates back to 20 June 1962, placing it in the context of Cold War-era activities.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
